12-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
FROM random_company_name_4 AS cn,
 random_company_type_4 AS ct,
 random_info_type_4 AS it1,
 random_info_type_4 AS it2,
 random_movie_companies_4 AS mc,
 random_movie_info_4 AS mi,
 random_movie_info_idx_4 AS mi_idx,
 random_title_4 AS t
WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id
 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mi.info_type_id = it1.id
 AND mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND cn.id = mc.company_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND cn.country_code = '[gb]'
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND it1.info = 'genres'
AND it2.info = 'votes'
AND mi.info IN ('Short', 'PCS:Spherical', 'Comedy', 'PCS:Spherical', 'RAT:1.33 : 1')
AND mi_idx.info > '27'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2001 AND 2007;
